GettingStartedFormAlt.descriptionParagra: A Kolibri, kana iya amfani da cibiya don gudanar da wani gungun masu amfani wanda suke da girma, kamar makaranta, wani shirin ilimi ko kowane saitin koyo daban. Kuma kana iya samun cibiyoyi da yawa akan na'ura guda.
Shin zaka so ka shirya wata cibiya?

LicenseDescriptionsForConsumers.All Righ: Baza ku iya raba, sauya, ko ƙara akan wannan kayan ba tare da izinin mai haƙƙin mallaka.
LicenseDescriptionsForConsumers.CC BY: Za ka iya raba, sauya, ko ƙara akan wannan kayan – ko kuma yi kasuwanci dashi – in dai zaka ambaci wanda ya wallafa.
LicenseDescriptionsForConsumers.CC BY-NC: Za ku iya sauya da ƙara akan wannan kayan ba don kasuwanci ba. Dole ka ambaci wanda ya wallafa akan sabin kayyayaki naka kuma baza ka iya kasuwanci dashi ba.
Za ku iya saukar da wannan kayan kuma ku raba zuwa wasu in dai kun ambaci wanda ya wallafa. Baza ku iya sauya shi ta kowace hanya ko amfani dashi don kasuwanci.
Za ku iya sauya, kuma ku ƙara akan wannan kayan ba don kasuwanci ba, in dai kun ambaci wanda ya wallafa kuma kun yi lasisin bisa ga ka'idodi makamantan haka.
LicenseDescriptionsForConsumers.CC BY-ND: Za ku iya sake amfani da kayan don kowace dalili hadda don kasuwanci. Amma baza iya sauya ba, kuma dole a ambaci wanda ya wallafa.
LicenseDescriptionsForConsumers.CC BY-SA: Za ku iya sauya kuma ku ƙara akan wannan kayan – koda don kasuwanci – in dai zaku ambaci wanda ya wallafa kuma ku yi lasisin sabin kayyayakin bisa ga ka'idodi makamantan haka. Duk sabin kayayyakin bisa ga naka dole su ɗauki lasisi iri ɗaya.
LicenseDescriptionsForConsumers.Public D: Babu wani abu sannane da aka haramta a cikin wannan kayan a karkashin dokar haƙƙin mallaka. Za ku iya rarraba, sauya, da ƙara akan wannan kayan, ko don kasuwanci.
LicenseDescriptionsForConsumers.Special: Wannan kayan nada lasisi na musamman. Tuntubi mai wannan lasisin don bayanin menene za'a bari ka yi dashi.
LicenseDescriptionsForCreators.All Right: Kai kaɗai keda dukkan haƙƙin bisa ga dokar haƙƙin mallaka, kuma wasu baza su iya rarraba, sauya, ko ƙara akan wannan kayan ba tare da izinin ka ba.
LicenseDescriptionsForCreators.CC BY: Wannan lasisin na bada dama wasu su rarraba, sauya, da ƙara akan kayan ka – koda don kasuwanci – in dai zasu ambato ka a matsayin wanda ya fara samarwa. Wannan shine wanda yafi bada dama cikin lasisin Creative Commons. Ana bada shawarar shi don a samu yadawa da amfani da kayayyaki masu lasisi sosai.
LicenseDescriptionsForCreators.CC BY-NC: Wannan lasisi na bada dama wasu su sauya kuma su ƙara akan kayan ka amma ba don kasuwanci ba. Kodayake sabin kayyayaki nasu dole su ambato ka kuma basa iya kasuwanci dasu, ba sai sun samu lasisi bisa ga ka'idodin iri ɗaya.
LicenseDescriptionsForCreators.CC BY-NC-: Wannan lasisin shine yafi matsawa a cikin manyan lasisi shida na Creative Commons. Yana bada dama wasu su saukar da kayyayakin ka kuma su raba zuwa wasu kawai in dai zasu ambato ka, amma basa iya canza su ta kowace hanya ko amfani dasu don kasuwanci.
Wannan lasisin yana bada dama wasu su sauya kuma su ƙara akan kayan ka amma ba don kasuwanci ba, in dai zasu ambato ka kuma suyi lasisin sabin kayayyakin su bisa ga ka'idodi makamanta.
LicenseDescriptionsForCreators.CC BY-ND: Wannan lasisin yana bada dama wasu su sake amfani da kayan don kowace dalili, hadda don kasuwanci. Amma ba za'a iya rarraba da wasu idan an sauya, kuma dole a ambato ka.
LicenseDescriptionsForCreators.CC BY-SA: Wannan lasisin yana barin wasu su sauya kuma su ƙara akan kayan ka – ko don kasuwanci – in dai sun ambato ka kuma sun yi lasisin sabin kayyayaki bisa ga ka'idodi makamanta. Galibi ana kwatanta wannan lasisin da lasisin manhajar kyauta “copyleft” open source. Duk sabin lasisi bisa ga naka zai ɗauki lasisi iri daya, saboda kowane sauyi zai bada dama a yi kasuwanci dashi. Wannan shine lasisin da Wikipedia ke amfani dashi. Ana bada shawarar shi don amfani ma kayayyakin da suke amfani da abubuwa daga Wikipedia ko ayyuka masu lasisi makamantan haka.
LicenseDescriptionsForCreators.Public Do: Babu wata abubuwan da aka haramta sannane cikin wannan kayan bisa ga dokar haƙƙin mallaka.
LicenseDescriptionsForCreators.Special P: Wannan wani lasisi na musamman don amfani idan wasu zaɓi bai dace ba. Kai ne da alhakin samar da bayanin menene wannan lasisin zai ƙunsa da sanarwa masu amfani dashi.
LongLicenseNames.CC BY-NC: Creative Commons: alaƙantawa, ba na kasuwanci ba
LongLicenseNames.CC BY-NC-ND: Creative Commons: alaƙantawa, ba na kasuwanci ba, babu ƙari
LongLicenseNames.CC BY-NC-SA: Creative Commons: alaƙantawa, ba na kasuwanci ba, za'a iya sauya ko ƙara akan kayan amma sai an ambato asalin wanda ya wallafa
LongLicenseNames.CC BY-SA: Creative Commons: alaƙantawa, za'a iya sauya ko ƙara akan kayan amma sai an ambato asalin wanda ya wallafa
LongLicenseNames.Public Domain: Na jama'a ba haƙƙin kowa bane

PrivacyInfoModal.kolibriAboutP1: Gidauniyar Learning Equity Inc ce ya kirkiri manhajar Kolibri. Ana iya samun karin bayanai da suka haɗa da dokokin Kolibri da bayanan sirri a:
PrivacyInfoModal.kolibriAboutP2: Kolibri wani manhajar ne wanda za'a iya sanya a na'urori daban-daban ba tare da buƙatar haɗuwa da yanar gizo.
PrivacyInfoModal.kolibriAboutP3: Ba kamar wasu ayyukan yanar gizo da dama wanda ake samun damar su ta mashigar yanar gizo, akwai dubbai manhajar na Kolibri masu zaman kansu a fadin duniya – hadda wannan. Kowane manhajar na Kolibri mai shin ke gudanar da lura dashi akan na'urar da yake kai.
PrivacyInfoModal.kolibriAboutP4: Kuma zai yiwu masu gudanarwa su haɗa bayanin Kolibri zuwa Shafin Bayanai na Kolibri mai aiki kamar cloud. Idan wannan ya faru, duk masu gudanarwa na ƙungiyar zasu samu damar dukkan bayanai cibiyar. Za'a tura zuwa rumbun ajiya cloud wanda Learning Equality suke lura dashi, kuma suma zasu samu damar wannan bayanin.
PrivacyInfoModal.kolibriAboutP5: Don ƙara ingancin Kolibri da kayyayakin dake kai, Learning Equality suna tattara bayanai na amfani cikin sirri a lokacin da Kolibri ya samu damar intanet. Wannan ya hada da adireshin IP masu alaƙa da rumbun ajiya na yanar gizo, da bayanin na'urar kamar manhajar aiki da yankin lokaci. Kuma muna tattara wasu jimillan ƙididdiga wanda ya hada da: yawan masu amfani da cibiyoyi, shekarar haihuwa da rabiyar jinsi, da karɓuwar kayan. Muna duk ƙoƙarin gujin tattara bayanai wanda zai sa a gano ainihin masu amfani da Kolibri.
PrivacyInfoModal.kolibriOwnersP1: Ya kamata ku yi amfani da Kolibri a matsayin tsari mai bin dukkan dokokin da ya kamata. Idan kai ne mai na'urar wanda aka sa Kolibri, ya kamata ka sani cewa a ƙarshe kai ne da alhakin tsaro da kariyar bayanin mai amfani wanda aka ajiye a Kolibri.
PrivacyInfoModal.kolibriOwnersP2: Yana da kyau ka bi tsarin kare bayanai domin kare bayanan masu amfani. Wannan ya haɗa da tabbatar da tsaron waya da kariyar ƙwaƙwab na hard drive ta hanyar amfani da kalmar sirri mai ƙarfi da ma sabunta tsarin na'ura a kai a kai.
PrivacyInfoModal.kolibriOwnersP3: Idan kun zaɓa haɗa bayanin cibiya zuwa Shafin Bayani na Kolibri, kuna bada dama masu gudanar da Shafin Bayanai na Kolibri su samu damar bayanin ka. Kuma kuna bada damar zuwa Learning Equality suma, wanda suke kula da rumbunan ajiyar bayanai.
PrivacyInfoModal.kolibriOwnersP4: A taimaka a tabbatar cewa masu amfani naka suna da hanyar tuntubar ka idan suna da damuwa game da shafukan su.
PrivacyInfoModal.kolibriUsersL1: Kada ku ba wani kalmar sirrin ku, bar kowa ya samu damar shafin ku, ko yi wani abu da zai sa shafin ka ya zama cikin haɗari
PrivacyInfoModal.kolibriUsersL2: Yi ƙoƙarin samun damar kowane shafin na wani mai amfani
PrivacyInfoModal.kolibriUsersL3: Cire, yi dabara, hana aiki, lalata ko kuma shiga abubuwa masu alaƙa da tsaro na Kolibri
PrivacyInfoModal.kolibriUsersL4: Kutse ko lalata tsarin Kolibri ta ko wace hanya
PrivacyInfoModal.kolibriUsersP1: Ya kamata kuyi amfani da Kolibri bisa ga dokokin da ya dace. Wannan wata kila yana nufin neman izini daga iyaye, jagora, ko malami.
PrivacyInfoModal.kolibriUsersP2: A sani cewa wasu zasu iya ganin bayanai ka, dangane akan yadda aka haɗa manhajar da kuma yadda ka ke samun damar shi.
PrivacyInfoModal.kolibriUsersP3: Ka tuntubi wakilin Kolibri ma yankinka don sanin irin bayanan da za ka iya ajiyewa, wake iya ganinsu, yadda za a sabunta ko goge su, ko idan kana tsammani an yi wa asusunka kutse
PrivacyInfoModal.kolibriUsersP5: A lokacin da kuke amfani da Kolibri a matsayin mai amfani da ya shiga, ana iya samar da bayanai kamar sunan ka, sunan shiga, shekaru, shekarar haihuwa, lambar Id, kayayyakin da ka ke dubawa, da ƙoƙarin ka akan jarrabawa zuwa masu gudanarwa da malamai a cikin cibiyar ka. Kuma masu shirya Kolibri na iya amfani da bayanai ka kuma su ba masu kirkiro abubuwa don taimakawa da inganta manhajar da kayayyaki don nau'ikan masu koyo da buƙatu daban-daban.
PrivacyInfoModal.kolibriUsersP6: Idan ka yi amfani da Kolibri a matsayin bako, za'a iya samar da jimillan bayanai game da kayyayakin da kai da sauran masu amfani a matsayin baki kuka duba zuwa masu gudanarwa da wasu malamai.
PrivacyInfoModal.openIdH1: Shiga wasu manhajar daban ta amfani da Kolibri
PrivacyInfoModal.openIdP1: Zai yiwu ka yi amfani da Kolibri don yin rajista ko shiga wasu manhajar daban. Idan ka yi hakan, ɗayan manhajar zasu samu damar sunan shigar ka na Kolibri, ID ka na musamman, da cikkaken suna.
RegisterFacilityModal.enterToken: Shigar da lambobin wani aiki daga Shafin Bayani na Kolibri
ReportErrorModal.emailDescription: Tuntubi dandalin masu taimakawa tare da bayani kan matsalarka, za mu yi iya kokarinmu
ReportErrorModal.forumPostingTips: Hada da bayanin menene ka ke ta ƙoƙarin yi kuma menene ka danna a lokacin da kuskuren ya nuna.
ReportErrorModal.forumUseTips: Bincika dandamalin masu amfani don ganin idan wasu sun fuskanci irin matsalolin. Idan ka kasa gano komai, manna bayanin kuskuren a kasan nan a cikin sabon wallafa saboda mu gyara kuskuren a wani sigar Kolibri na gaba.
SelectDeviceForm.deletingFailedText: Am samu matsala wajen cire wannan na'urar
